page.title: 15OIL PIPELINE
page.content:
OIL PIPELINE
As we were making this survey we found a great line being cut across the land. A very straight trench about 2 metres deep went far into the distance. A yellow digger was scooping out clay and we found out that this is the route of an oil pipeline. It is not for our area but will take oil from a refinery near Southampton to the industrial Midlands. When the job is finished the pipe will be completely hidden and the top soil will be replaced to grow crops. Oil is our main source of energy and this pipe will deliver great quantities of fuel without anyone on the surface even knowing it is there.
